meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Divide</kanji> a body and <kanji>untie</kanji> its organs to perform an <vocabulary>autopsy</vocabulary>. You have to cut it all up and untangle the parts to see why this person or animal died.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
